comment: Professor Chung produced a consistent, structured online class intended for your success. No final exam or midterm, you write introductory and reflective essays with prompts at the beginning and end of the semester that were far more valuable than any test. 1 Quiz & 1 Discussion Post weekly, with a intro video posted weekly. Highly recommend!!!

He makes the class incredibly easy (no tests). Only issue I have is his lecture style. His lectures are often boring and he talks about most topics like he isn't too sure about what he's teaching. Half of the final grade comes from in class discussions, so attendance matters. Overall, an easy A, just not a great lecturer.

Professor Chungs 3500 course was not too difficult & attendance isnt technically mandatory but you have in class assignments due on Thursday & Tuesday so if you miss class that day you get a 0 with no chance to make it up. His grading criteria is very particular. Also hes a boring & monotone lecturer so do not take him early in the morning.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Easy class but particular about assignments. Make sure you read his syllabus. He throws out 0's for missing one little thing like numbering paragraphs.
Not much to say about it, just a very easy class, very cool professor.

Good professor, easy class. 2 quizzes a week, one from the chapter in the book and the other from a news article he posts on d2l. Uses a lot of true false questions which can get annoying but overall its an easy class and he's good at getting back to you over email as well.
